content.rendered: The Medi Center is a Medical Clinic/Doctor’s Office in Kenai, Alaska. They were in need of a website design, seo, map optimization, and a pay per click campaign that would put them in front of potential patients. In a short period of time we were able to achieve top rankings in maps and organic listings and a low cost per click in our ppc efforts.
